Open Gym

Practice your skills during our open gym sessions

What is Open Gym?

Open Gym provides gymnasts with supervised access to our equipment for independent practice. Perfect for working on specific skills, conditioning, or just staying active!

Requirements

  • Must be 8 years or older
  • Previous gymnastics experience required
  • Safety orientation completed
  • Parent/guardian waiver signed

Schedule

  • Monday - Friday: 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM
  • Saturday: 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM
  • Sunday: 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM

Pricing

  • Single Session: $20 per person
  • 10-Session Pass: $160 (Save $40!)
  • Monthly Unlimited: $100

Safety First

All participants must follow our safety guidelines and listen to our supervising coaches. Equipment usage is monitored to ensure everyone's safety.

Ready to Practice?

Contact us to schedule your safety orientation and get started!
